titles.title: A resolution creating a Select Committee to Investigate Covert Arms Transactions with Iran.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Rules.
Called up by House as Privileged Matter.
Measure Considered in House as in the Committee of the Whole.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Yea-Nay Vote: 416 - 2 (Record Vote No: 6).

bill.summary: 1/6/1987--Introduced. Creates a House Select Committee to Investigate Covert Arms Transactions with Iran. Requires the Committee to report to the House of Representatives by October 30, 1987.
